nodes.text: Yuw was a location in the galaxy where the Dark Quarter was located. At some point prior to the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, the Sith Lord Darth Vader traveled to Yuw after learning of a plot to assassinate him. He interrogated and killed several bounty hunters in the Dark Quarter in order to gain information on the Hidden Hand criminal syndicate, who were behind the plot.

Yuw appeared in the first issue of the 2019 comic-book series Star Wars: Target Vader, written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Marc Laming and Cris Bolson, and released by Marvel Comics on July 3, 2019.
